entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm near the American border. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
